purpose: The email announces an open position for a post-doctoral researcher in Model-Driven Engineering at Johannes Kepler University Linz, Austria, starting ideally in 2025. The position focuses on exploring model-driven, structured engineering, particularly in tracking model changes. The successful candidate will engage in various activities including supervision, publication, experimental studies, grant writing, and teaching. The email outlines the candidate profile, emphasizing the need for a Ph.D. in Informatics or a related field, strong English skills, and excellent programming abilities. It also details the position's duration, salary, and the research group's reputation and environment in Linz.
